title.en: A Royal Princess with Black Hair

altTitles.th: เจ้าหญิงผมสีเข้ม

description.en:
The Crown Prince of the Murian Empire, Karyuel, and the Princess of the Carna Empire, Yurishien, despise their political betrothal and dream of breaking it. To make matters worse, the people around them begin devising all sorts of schemes to split them up, and as they overcome the obstacles together, they become drawn to each other, despite their initial thoughts. Will these two immature birds be able to break it as they had planned or will there be a different outcome…?  

---
• Alternate Raws: [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/black_hair), [PeanuToon](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/5585)

• Official Translations (non-English): [French](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/royale-rebellion), [Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/royal-princess/list?title_no=2108), [Japanese](https://www.comico.jp/articleList.nhn?titleNo=31217), [S. Chinese](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6354/).

• Alternate Official English: [Manta](https://manta.net/series/1141), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/151), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/a-royal-princess-with-black-hair/info).

Note: All alternate English translations are simply republishings of the Tappytoon translation, as they hold the official license.
description.es:
Karyuel, el Príncipe Heredero del Imperio de Murian y Yurishien, la Princesa del Imperio de Carna, odian su compromiso de matrimonio político y sueñan con romperlo. Lo que es peor es que la gente a sus alrededores empiezan a maquinar y planear su división, y superando obstáculos juntos, empiezan a atraerse el uno al otro a pesar de sus pensamientos iniciales. ¿Acaso estos dos pichuelos inmaduros podrán romper como habían planeado, o habrá otro resultado…?  


---
